name: Box?
description:
Im Gas, a Indie developer in C#, I`m 14 years old and this is my First project.

Hello!

Have you ever wanted to be a box?
No?
Well now yes! Join Boxy on his adventure and discover the secrets of his world.

Thank goodness that boxy has a grappling hook because otherwise you would not leave difficult places xd.

And what about your power to reset everything!

Sometimes it scares me because I don't know where that wonderful Evan King Music comes from.

aaand, remember this game is Free and without ads, which is better than something Free, yes, nothing !!!

The android version is a gameplay test, it is not the final version. The game is intended to be an open world ...

Download it now !!

You already know that if you want you can donate, that would motivate me to make this great personal project faster. : D
